item.description:
Kelly's Pub is located on the corner of Crown & Temple Streets in downtown New Haven. 

Come sit by the fire & enjoy the warm, inviting ambiance that is Kelly's!
 Choose from over 20 different draft beers, 18 wines by the glass (the list is growing!) or some great cocktails like a St Germaine Cocktail, a Ginger Surprise or a hot Toddy ! 
Our menu is full of delights which will appeal to everyones tastes. The house favorite is the Double Cut Pork Chop with cinnamon spiked apples & mac n cheese.  Pair it with a  glass of Viognier from France & enjoy the moment!   

Your hosts are husband and wife team Patrick Hogan and Lisa Doherty.  
Their philosophy is to provide their guests with great food and great wine in relaxing and cosy surroundings - they believe that these ingredients combined make for a memorable & unforgettable visit. 

We will meet up around 7 pm socialize, eat, drink and enjoy the atmosphere. Then around 9:30 there will be an Irish music quartet for listening enjoyment.

When: February 26, 2011

Where: Kelly's Irish Pub

Why: Because we love a good Irish pub! By the way...the owner and his wife both have wonderful Irish brogues :)
item.how_to_find_us: Where the big group of fun loving people are :)

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Kelly's Irish Pub..... with Irish music quartet!!!
